name: Gold or Glory
overview: The time is summer 1988, the place is Seoul, Korea, the reason, the Olympic Games. You are the women's javelin coach and you are worried our two great medal hopes have not been performing their best since arriving two weeks ago. SOMETHING is amiss. It is Wednesday. If you cannot resolve the problem in time for the event on Saturday, our medal hopes will go down the tube. But where do you start? In your hotel of course so get on with it, there is not much time left!
